ing: 4 large ripe tomatoes, sliced 1/4 inch thick
1 pound fresh mozzarella cheese, sliced 1/4 inch thick
freshly ground black pepper to taste
des: "Because this salad is so simple, fresh, top-quality tomatoes and mozzarella are important."
ins: On a large platter, alternate and overlap the tomato slices, mozzarella cheese slices, and basil leaves. Drizzle with olive oil. Season with sea salt and pepper.
